```{r}
library(zoo)
library(lubridate)
library(tidyverse)
```

```{r}
Euoplos_Rainbow_region <- galah_call() |>
  galah_identify("Euoplos Rainbow") |>
  galah_select(locality, cl22) |>
  atlas_occurrences() |>
  na.omit()
```









```{r}
final_Euoplos_Rainbow1 <- final_Euoplos_Rainbow %>%
  mutate(
    Quarter = as.yearqtr(eventDate)
  ) %>%
  rename(State = cl22)
  
```

```{r}
library(zoo)

final_Euoplos_Rainbow1$Quarter <- yearquarter(final_Euoplos_Rainbow1$Quarter) 

```



```{r}
merged_data <- left_join(final_Euoplos_Rainbow1, tourism, by = c("Quarter", "State"))
```


```{r}
ggplot(merged_data, aes(x = State)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "count") +
  labs(title = "Count of States") +
  theme_minimal()
```
